page.title: 15CHILDREN AND SCHOOL
page.content: The village school was regretfully closed 4yrs ago,the children now attend the Alburgh with Denton Voluntary Controlled 1st.School from 5 _8yrs.Following this they go to the Canon Pickering Junior School for 3yrs then on to the Archbishop Sancroft High(both in Harleston)until leaving school at 16.Children are taught to read,write,& mathematics at their 1st school,these skills are developed later to include languages,geography, history,music,computer work,sports, handicrafts & social skills.After school hours children go to Youth Club "Brownies","Cubs & Scouts".At home the children{play}alone or in groups much as generations of children before_ emulating their parents & copying characters from television,which plays a large part in children's{education} & entertainment.
